product_name: ChicoBag Vita Purple Blooms Reusable Bag - Women's
long_description: The ChicoBag Vita Purple Blooms Reusable Bag offers a hefty 40 lb. capacity that you can carry on your shoulder. It's perfect for trips to the market, library or beach. Durable polyester fabric holds up to 40 lbs. of weight (for reference, a gallon of milk weighs approximately 7 lbs.). Bag is easy to stow in your pocket or purse with an integrated stuff pouch; stuff pouch has a drawcord closure and mini clip. Pouch is approximately 4 x 4 in.; fabric allows easy opening and stuffing, and no special folding is required. Wash the ChicoBag Vita Purple Blooms Reusable Bag in cold water and hang to dry.
short_description: The ChicoBag Vita Purple Blooms Reusable Bag offers a hefty 40 lb. capacity that you can carry on your shoulder. It's perfect for trips to the market, library or beach.
